attributes.background: In recent years, speed limits in many places in this country have been reduced to a ridiculous level, and our roads are now becoming littered with average speed cameras. People drive cars, not milk floats, so stop continually trying to mug the motorist, and introduce more realistic speed limits.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "realistic speed limits". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
